changelog: UI Overhaul: Completely redesigned the interface to significantly improve readability and workflow. Enjoy a cleaner, more intuitive experience!
Visual Enhancements: Polished various UI elements and animations for a more modern and fluid look.
URL Integration: You can now add website links directly to your profiles. EL will automatically open them in your default browser upon launch â€” perfect for charts, flight plans, or live maps!
Resource Recovery (Auto-Close): Added a feature to automatically close specific background apps when a profile starts. You can also enable 'Auto-Restart' to restore those apps once your session ends.
Process Priority Management: You can now set CPU priority levels independently for every app in a profile. Optimize your processor's focus for better performance!
Dynamic Shortcut System: Rebuilt the shortcut engine from scratch. Desktop shortcuts now update instantly when a profile is edited and are automatically deleted when a profile is removed.
App Toggling: Added the ability to temporarily disable individual applications within a profile without having to delete them. Perfect for testing different setups!
Smart Update Notifications: EL will now notify you of available updates even when launching profiles directly from desktop shortcuts. Stay current without ever opening the main app!
General Stability: Implemented a large number of under-the-hood fixes and performance optimizations for a smoother overall experience.
